BIO

Passionate Independent Programmer Pursuing BTech in Computer Science from Galgotias University. I am interested in technical fields like Data Structures and Algorithms, Web Development, etc. My favorite language is C++ as it is statically typed and supports pointer to manage memory manually. In my free time I like to listen music to refresh my mind and implement my ideas in structured way through coding.
